org.fhnw.aigs.Minesweeper.server

Class GameLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fhnw.aigs.commons.Game
      • org.fhnw.aigs.Minesweeper.server.GameLogic

  • public class GameLogic
extends org.fhnw.aigs.commons.Game
    This class represents the game logic part of Minesweeper.
    v1.0 Initial release
    v1.1 Minor changes in Handling
    Version:
    v1.1
    Author:
    Matthias St√∂ckli (v1.1)

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameLogic

        public GameLogic()
          throws java.lang.Exception
        Empty constructor which is necessary in order to load the game.
        Don't forgett to set the same game name in the class Main in the package 'client'.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • coverUpConnectedFields

        private java.util.HashSet<MinesweeperField> coverUpConnectedFields(MinesweeperField field)
        Gets all fields without mines around the specified field. The borders are marked by fields with mines in proximity
        Parameters:
        field - Field to be checked (center)
        Returns:
        HashSet of all fields without mines around the specified field

      • handleGameEnd

        private void handleGameEnd(org.fhnw.aigs.commons.Player player)
        If the player clicked on a mine, the game will end. All fields will be uncovered. The user will be asked whether he wants to restart the game.
        Parameters:
        player - A reference to the player.

      • uncoverDangerousField

        Parameters:
